title: Brown bag seminars
text:
1 Information
“Brown bag” is a series of seminars focused on agriculture, food, and economics in low and middle income settings.



Farming in Mali (source).


The name originates from the paper bag children used to bring to school with lunch inside. It suggests that the seminar takes place at lunch time, when audience is invited to bring their food and have lunch while listening to the speaker.


2 Rules

Each seminar lasts 1 hour and starts at noon.
Bring your lunch and consume it quietly, respecting the speaker.
The seminar is discussion focused, we give enough time for questions, answers, and discussion on the topic. When you prepare a presentation, do not overload it with information or slides - leave room for everyone to ask questions and talk.
